short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Designed to improve productivity for Automotive dealerships, activates Momentum CRM software to instantly display customer records.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Designed to improve productivity for Automotive dealerships, this Chrome extension activates Momentum CRM software to instantly screen pop customer records when calls are received. (Requires the latest version of Chrome).

It instantly detects phone numbers of incoming callers and pops the CRM software ​record from Momentum CRM system. Eliminate the need to search files increasing productivity and collaboration.
 
-- Boost productivity of sales and customer support teams
-- Works seamlessly with Clarity’s Web Client and Momentum CRM
-- Phone Number Detection
